message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.
I understand that $150 is a bit high, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $125.
I appreciate you being willing to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit too much for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $95 right now.
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further and meet you at $115.
I'm really pushing my limits here, but I can only go up to $105. Let's make this deal happen!
I can see you're really serious about this product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $110.
I'm really pushing my limits here, but I can only go up to $100. It's my final offer, and if it doesn't work, I'll have to go with another seller.
I understand you're at your limit, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise one last time and meet you at $108.
